attributes.additional_details:
Cadburys' Creme Eggs, have reduced the number in the box from 6 to 5 but charge the same price and have changed the recipe.
We must defend this British institution.

Government to
-Clearly define the number in the box
-Price increases to be capped at inflation
-Size/weight of eggs to be standardised
-Recipe must include Cadburys dairy milk chocolate.
-Prevent companies from substantially changing a product but branding it the same
